articles.title: From the California gold rush to Sydney Sweeney: How denim became the most enduring garment in American fashion - CNBC
articles.description: The American blue jean was created in 1873 by tailor Jacob Davis, who patented the design with Levi Strauss, founder of the eponymous denim retailer
articles.content:

articles.title: Trump struggles to persuade Americans to ignore affordability issues - The Washington Post
articles.description: A president who has often seemed to float above the laws of politics confronts a new political reality.
articles.content: President Donald Trump has said drug prices are falling by as much as 1,500 percent, a mathematical impossibility. He has declared himself the affordability president, while dismissing the affordabil… [+39 chars]
